title: Help> Trying to Find a relaxing Aus/Oceania time zone clan
body:
Hi,
I'm quite new to the board. I've played LOL on n off and i've just came back on after relocating, where i've lost my net (on my data now)
I've nvr used this community, bcuz i mainly played solo or wit (few)friends who play lol as well. But now that I'm actually trying to get better and play more often, I def wanted to b in a clan that could guide me and play socially.
I've been to the team recruitment page and while I think i can tell which clans are relaxing and all, I wasn't sure which would suit my time zone (Oceania)
Can someone help me to find a clan that'd suit me?? 
thanks in advance

replies.body: These are the Oceania boards. If you're looking through team recruitment on here then most people should be around your timezone. That being said if you wanna play sometime check out our discord: discord.gg/xU22hbM

Hey Jepman
Thank you for the reply,
Just realised that thanks to your comment haha..  Kinda feel silly.  I'll have to get used to all these apps (discord).  browsing through the link atm. Kinda lost tryin to see what's what hahaha
thanks again !
